p: The LRB (39°10′–42°30′ N, 115°30′–119°15′ E), located at the northern Haihe River Basin, is one of the four major rivers in the Haihe River Basin. The Luanhe River originates from the foot of the Bayandun-Tuergu Mountain and discharges into Bohai Bay, Hebei Province [ 38, 39]. The river flows through 27 cities and counties in Hebei Province, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region and Liaoning Province, with watershed area of 44,750 km 2. The basin has a population of 5.4442 million with population density of 122 persons/km².
